title: Font ID - Beautiful Modernist face
content:
Hi All,

Feel like I know this but just put my finger in it...

The sample is from the menu for Bellota - a restaurant in Auckland, New Zealand - apologies for the photo quality: iPhone plus bad light = noisy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106081317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0017_6466.png)
author: workandtumble

comments.content: Aye Neutraface it is - thanks for your help!

I knew this one was familiar.  
Howerver i love it, I never can identify Neutraface...
